author: skitching
msg: Ensure an ExceptionInInitializerError occurs when trying to create an instance
of these classes in pre-1.4 JVMs. Without this, an InvocationTargetException
could be thrown when calling the constructor but that could also be caused
by a number of other reasons which we don't want to ignore.

author: jm
msg: more unbuffering, could be part of why those tests are failing on Michael's SuSE build slave

author: jm
msg: a little bit of paranoia: ensure log fh is unbuffered
